experience.description: Development of a Virtual Reality Game for a University Research Project focused on local food culture heritage, where you can learn how to prepare two traditional dishes by cooking them in VR.

I'm very proud to have been part of Wideverse team where I worked on, among the others, scotty.expert which is a solution powered by AR technologies that connects first-line workers with remote experts.

I designed 2D and 3D assets for websites, smartphone and desktop applications, as well as animated asset for the motion graphics. I worked side by side with the software developers to better integrate the graphic assets in our products.
